description: With the unique “Always On” LCD display, the InSight™ portable hard drive allows users to personalize their drive name and shows available free space, even when the drive is disconnected. The Insight™ drive’s sleek, piano-black finish and unique, curvaceous design add a touch of class to your netbook, notebook, or desktop computer accessories. Available in capacities of 320GB and 500GB, the Insight™ portable hard drive is backed by a 7-year limited warranty to give you peace of mind while commuting or traveling.
title: Verbatim InSight 500 GB USB 2.0 Portable External Hard Drive 96980 (Black)
